name: Prateek Saxena
content: Prateek Saxena's Home Page Prateek Saxena Hi! I am faculty member in the Computer Science Department at National University of Singapore. My research is on security of machine learning and software/hardware systems. Current Research Thrusts - Security of ML systems, Secure Processor Architecture, and Automatic Program Translation. Please see our recent publications. I lead the KISP Lab. The name stands for 'Keep It Secure and Private'. Several spinoffs came out of our research, notably Zilliqa and Kyber Network. I have fond memories of the CS department at UC Berkeley, where I got my PhD in 2012. Associate Professor Computer Science Division COM3-02-03, School of Computing National University of Singapore Email: prateeks at comp dot nus dot edu dot sg Publications Team Software Teaching CV Google Scholar Fix A Meeting?
